page.title: 14Rural Health Services
page.content: There is no resident doctor or dentist in this block, and people travel to Bromyard where there is a partnership of five doctors with another doctor who works on a part time basis. There are two dentists and two opticians, and a chiropodist in Bromyard. People needing hospital treatment are referred to Hereford or Worcester, those in urgent need of surgery sometimes opting for private treatment in the Nuffield Home in Hereford. The Bromyard hospital is now for geriatrics only. There is a day hospital to which some elderly people are taken twice a week, where they receive physiotherapy, baths, hair- dressing and lunch. Plans for a new community hospital and elderly peoples home in Bromyard have been approved. Schoolchildren have regular medical examinations and by an audiometrician.
